DOC.brief_summary: This study initiate investigate effect infant formula add specific prebiotic oligosaccharide reduction specific potential pathogen and/or toxin .
DOC.criteria: Healthy term infant ( gestational age 37 42 week ) age 22.5 month inclusion Fully formula feed least one week ( applicable breastfeed reference group since infant must exclusively breastfed throughout study ) Parents ' guardian 's write informed consent Being wean inclusion ( introduction food formula breast milk . ) Moderate severe acute malnutrition , define weightforage sex 2 zscores median WHO growth standard Disorders require special diet ( food intolerance food allergy complaint reflux , constipation cramp ) Significant congenital abnormality could affect study result Use systemic antibiotic antimycotic drug 4 week precede study Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability parent comply protocol requirement Participation study involve investigational market product concomitantly within two week prior entry study Gastroenteritis last two week inclusion
